title: Ticket #4925: Create a "subdag versus splice" wiki entry
description:
I think it would be good to have a "sub-DAG versus splice" entry in the HTCondor Wiki. This could include the advantages and disadvantages of each one, and when you'd want to use one versus the other. It also could include some "tricks", especially for using splices; for example:
  • NOOP nodes before and after the splice to attach PRE and POST scripts.
  • A NOOP node between splices to prevent possible combinatorial explosion of dependencies.
  • Probably a bunch of other stuff I'm not thinking of at the moment...
